Futures & Options â€” Our Core Focus

Why Futures?

Futures let you trade market indexes and assets with defined tick values and nearly 24/5 access. We teach:

  • Contracts & tick values (e.g., MNQ / MES)
  • Session structure & key market levels
  • Risk per trade and scaling rules

Why Options?

Options provide leverage with defined risk. For beginners we emphasize simple, repeatable structures:

  • Debit spreads (bull call / bear put)
  • Basic Greeks & premium behavior
  • Trade planning: entry, stop, targets, review

Educational content only. We do not provide financial advice. Trading involves risk; never risk money you cannot afford to lose.
